ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"أَأَنتُمْ","word_ayah":64,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":69123,"word_number_in_surah":234,"word_translation":"Is it you (who)","word_transliteration":"a-antum"},{"word_arabic":"تَزْرَعُونَهُ","word_ayah":64,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":69124,"word_number_in_surah":235,"word_translation":"cause it to grow","word_transliteration":"tazra'unahu"},{"word_arabic":"أَمْ","word_ayah":64,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":69125,"word_number_in_surah":236,"word_translation":"or","word_transliteration":"am"},{"word_arabic":"نَحْنُ","word_ayah":64,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":69126,"word_number_in_surah":237,"word_translation":"(are) We","word_transliteration":"nahnu"},{"word_arabic":"الزَّارِعُونَ","word_ayah":64,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":69127,"word_number_in_surah":238,"word_translation":"the Ones Who grow","word_transliteration":"al-zari'una"}]

[{"word_arabic":"أَأَنتُمْ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":69143,"word_number_in_surah":254,"word_translation":"Is it you","word_transliteration":"a-antum"},{"word_arabic":"أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":69144,"word_number_in_surah":255,"word_translation":"who send it down","word_transliteration":"anzaltumuhu"},{"word_arabic":"مِنَ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":69145,"word_number_in_surah":256,"word_translation":"from","word_transliteration":"mina"},{"word_arabic":"الْمُزْنِ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":69146,"word_number_in_surah":257,"word_translation":"the rain clouds","word_transliteration":"al-muz'ni"},{"word_arabic":"أَمْ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":69147,"word_number_in_surah":258,"word_translation":"or","word_transliteration":"am"},{"word_arabic":"نَحْنُ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":69148,"word_number_in_surah":259,"word_translation":"We","word_transliteration":"nahnu"},{"word_arabic":"الْمُنزِلُونَ","word_ayah":69,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":69149,"word_number_in_surah":260,"word_translation":"(are) the Ones to send","word_transliteration":"al-munziluna"}]

[{"word_arabic":"لَوْ","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":69150,"word_number_in_surah":261,"word_translation":"If","word_transliteration":"law"},{"word_arabic":"نَشَاءُ","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":69151,"word_number_in_surah":262,"word_translation":"We willed","word_transliteration":"nashau"},{"word_arabic":"جَعَلْنَاهُ","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":69152,"word_number_in_surah":263,"word_translation":"We (could) make it","word_transliteration":"ja'alnahu"},{"word_arabic":"أُجَاجًا","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":69153,"word_number_in_surah":264,"word_translation":"salty","word_transliteration":"ujajan"},{"word_arabic":"فَلَوْلَا","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":69154,"word_number_in_surah":265,"word_translation":"then why are you not grateful","word_transliteration":"falawla"},{"word_arabic":"تَشْكُرُونَ","word_ayah":70,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":69155,"word_number_in_surah":266,"word_translation":"then why are you not grateful","word_transliteration":"tashkuruna"}]

[{"word_arabic":"نَحْنُ","word_ayah":73,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":69166,"word_number_in_surah":277,"word_translation":"We","word_transliteration":"nahnu"},{"word_arabic":"جَعَلْنَاهَا","word_ayah":73,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":69167,"word_number_in_surah":278,"word_translation":"have made it","word_transliteration":"ja'alnaha"},{"word_arabic":"تَذْكِرَةً","word_ayah":73,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":69168,"word_number_in_surah":279,"word_translation":"a reminder","word_transliteration":"tadhkiratan"},{"word_arabic":"وَمَتَاعًا","word_ayah":73,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":69169,"word_number_in_surah":280,"word_translation":"and a provision","word_transliteration":"wamata'an"},{"word_arabic":"لِّلْمُقْوِينَ","word_ayah":73,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":69170,"word_number_in_surah":281,"word_translation":"for the wayfarers in the desert","word_transliteration":"lil'muq'wina"}]
